attributes.action: End parking restrictions for city centre workers during COVID19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Too allow workers to travel to and from work and lessen the numbers on public transport
attributes.background: End parking restrictions and charges for staff who cannot work from home during the COVID 19 outbreak.

rejection.details: Parking charges are set by local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament. Some councils have chosen to relax parking restrictions in their area, you can find out more on your council's website.
